description: Example videos for Kling 3.0 model showcase

parameters.prompt:
animation of the same blonde cat girl from the reference image dancing in place. 
She performs a cute idol-style dance, small rhythmic steps, gentle arm swings, light hip movements. 
Her long blonde hair and pleated skirt sway naturally with motion. 
Her expression remains cheerful and consistent throughout. 
Full body shot, static camera, centered composition. 
Outfit and appearance must remain identical to the reference image during the entire video. 
Soft pastel blue and purple gradient background with floating bokeh light particles. 
Smooth animation, high consistency, no outfit changes, no hairstyle changes.

multi_prompt.prompt:
Wide cinematic aerial shot. 
The same silver-haired celestial warrior stands at the center of a gigantic floating stone platform above moving clouds. 
The enormous moon dominates the sky, stars shimmering. 
Her long silver hair and translucent cape flow gently in the wind. 
Soft moonlight illuminates her armor details. 
Slow dramatic camera push-in. 
Epic scale, volumetric lighting, majestic atmosphere.

Medium full-body shot. 
The same warrior raises one hand toward the sky. 
Blue cosmic energy begins to gather around her palm, glowing particles spiral upward. 
Her cape flows dynamically, armor reflecting blue light. 
Clouds below move slowly. 
The moonlight and energy light mix together. 
Camera slowly circles around her.

Close-up heroic shot from slightly below. 
The same silver-haired celestial warrior releases a burst of radiant blue cosmic light upward into the sky. 
Her glowing blue eyes shine intensely. 
Wind blows her hair dramatically. 
Energy light reflects on her armor and face. 
Background becomes a luminous star explosion effect. 
Epic climax moment, high detail, stable facial features.

parameters.prompt:
1990s anime style, classic cel shading, hand-drawn look.
A teenage male psychic fighter with spiky dark brown hair and a red headband stands on a rocky cliff under a stormy sky.
He wears a sleeveless white martial arts top, loose dark blue pants, red wristbands, and black boots.
Lightning flashes behind him, wind blowing his clothes dramatically.
Small rocks begin floating around his body as psychic energy builds.
Low angle dramatic shot, thick ink outlines, strong shadows, intense retro anime atmosphere.

multi_prompt.prompt:
Wide cinematic shot.
The same young woman stands on the rooftop edge at dawn.
Soft wind moves her hair and jacket slightly.
The city skyline glows with early morning light.
Natural handheld camera slowly pushing in.
Realistic lighting, subtle lens flare, atmospheric depth, grounded physical movement.

Medium shot from the side.
The same woman takes a slow breath and looks toward the rising sun.
Her expression shifts from uncertainty to determination.
Wind lifts strands of her hair naturally.
Soft golden sunlight hits her face from the side.
Camera gently circles around her.
Cinematic realism, natural skin detail, consistent outfit and hairstyle.

Close-up cinematic shot.
The same woman closes her eyes briefly, then opens them with calm determination.
The rising sun illuminates her face with warm light.
Background softly blurred city skyline.
Subtle emotional performance, realistic micro expressions.
35mm film look, natural skin texture, no stylization.
